pages.text: $(item)Bone Shards$() can be found by mining $(item)Fossil Ore.
$(item)Bone Shards$() can be broken from larger pieces of bone on an $(item)Anvil$().

$(item)Flint Shards$() can be broken from larger pieces of $(item)Flint$() on an $(item)Anvil$().$(p)$(item)Flint Shards$() can also be found by using a shovel to excavate $(item)Gravel$(). $(info) Higher tier shovels have a better chance of finding flint.
